capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was reading about Harry's family history and it turns out he has a pretty interesting mix of magical heritage. His mom, Lily, was a witch, and his dad, James, was also a wizard, but with some... complicated ancestry, let's say. There's this whole thing with Tom Riddle, aka Lord Voldemort, who was actually a descendant of Salazar Slytherin, one of the founders of Hogwarts. It's pretty wild to think about how that lineage could have influenced Harry's own destiny.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm not a fan of the new system that's been put in place.
